Title: Time Capsule
Plot: Leslie wants to bury a time capsule that encapsulates life in Pawnee, but an odd suggestion from a local man causes unforeseen consequences. Andy seeks help from Chris about how to win back April.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Will Forte, Natalie Morales, Jama Williamson, Alison Becker, Darlene Hunt
